attributes.action: mothers last letter from all militry personal wether married or not
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
make our troops leave a last letter to there parents 
my son died in may  out in afgan and there  was no letter left for us  the heartbreak i have had to deal with    has left me and his family hearbroken and i feel all personael should be made to do this on a  compulsary level to  leave parents last letters in case of the  fate i have been left with my memories have been ripped from me and my son is not here to defend  himself there will always be these problems but no matter how hard our minds dont stop and it spoils the happy memories we all had so to stop any mother going through the hell i have over the last 5 months i would realy like this made to all mimitry personel

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
